worngCodeFromUrl: Wrong code, please check the URL (if you manually copied and pasted it) or if the code is expired
wrongPasswordFormatError: Enter a combination of at least eight numbers, letters and punctuation marks(non-whitespace)
confirmPasswordError: Your password and confirmation password do not match.
passwordResetCompleteMessage: Your password has been set, you can back to the login page.
resetPasswordFailError: Failed to reset your password, please check if the verification code is expired.
usernameIsTaken: That username is taken. Try another.
failToGetUserData: Fail to get user data, please back to the login page.
